dmca.title: illegal activity on www.evtracker.info
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: blazed@fundymail.ca [mailto:blazed@fundymail.ca] 
Sent: Thursday, January 12, 2006 7:33 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: illegal activity on www.evtracker.info

well i sent a email to the abuse email adress too...but Vid Kosir is running
a illegal torrent tracker(www.evtracker.info) that is distributing
copyrighted material....i dont see how anyone hasnt noticed this yet...but
it needs to be stopped....i will include all the info i can in here if i
forget anything or if u need further info please contact me ASAP...well here
is some info ive found i got the folling information from
http://www.whois.sc/evtracker.info
the email adress is blocked when i copy/paste it he can be reached at
vid.kosir@gmail.com please contact me as soon as possible and let me know
what the deal is with this...if guys cant pursue this let me know who can
and how i can get in touch with them Sincerly,
         Mike
